螷螷螷

Related Character(s): 蠯, 𤼜
Связанный символ (и): 蠯, 𤼜

螷字的基本解释

螷
pí
古书上说的一种形状狭长的蚌。

螷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pí］
［《廣韻》符支切，平支，並。］
［《廣韻》蒲幸切，上耿，並。］
［《廣韻》薄佳切，平佳，並。］
亦作“螷1”。
狭长的蚌。

螷字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　螷； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1095第09
【集韻】頻彌切，音陴。蚌狹而長者爲螷。　又白猛切，音?。與蜯、蚌通。　或作蠯、?。

螷字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
螷字的起名意思

暂无。

Chi
Basic explanation of words
Chi
pí
A long and narrow clam described in ancient books.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pí］
["Guangyun" Fu branch cut, flat branch, and. ]
["Guangyun" Pu Xingqie, Shang Geng, and. ]
["Guang Yun" Bo Jiaqie, Ping Jia, and. ]
Also known as "Ji 1".
Long and narrow clam.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　螷; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1095 Page 09
[Jiyun] Frequency Miqie, Yinque. The clam is narrow and the elder is an anchovy.　 Cut again white and fiercely, sound?. Connect with squint and clam.　Or as a crustacean, ?.
